public class SecantMethodEquationSolver extends MediumPointBasedEquationSolver
Solves for the root of a function using secant method. See MediumPointBasedEquationSolver

      public SecantMethodEquationSolver(RealFunction function, double a, double b, double accuracy)
      Creates an instance of SecantMethodEquationSolver
      Parameters:
      function - the function for which to find a root
      a - the left endpoint of the interval to be searched
      b - the right endpoint of the interval to be searched
      accuracy - an upper bound on the difference between the real root and the approximate root

  • Method Details

    • middle

      protected double middle(double left, double right)
      Finds a point between left and right by finding the y-intercept of the line segment passing through (left, y(left)) and (right, y(right))
      Specified by:
      middle in class MediumPointBasedEquationSolver
      Parameters:
      left - a left endpoint
      right - a right endpoint
      Returns:
      a point in the interval of [left, right] that is the y-intercept of the line segment.
